tools.name: tavily_web_search
tools.description: General web search across multiple languages. Use for discovering papers in regional databases and validating translations.

parameters.query: Search query (automatically translated to target language)

tools.name: exa_web_search
tools.description: Semantic search for academic papers with language filtering. Preferred for scholarly content.

parameters.category: Always use 'research paper' for academic content

tools.name: read_url_content
tools.description: Extract full-text content from paper URLs. Handles multi-language PDFs and HTML.

parameters.url: Paper URL (journal page, preprint server, or direct PDF)

tools.name: google_docs_create_document
tools.description: Create formal multilingual literature review reports.

tools.name: google_docs_append_text
tools.description: Add translated content to existing reports.

tools.name: google_sheets_create_spreadsheet
tools.description: Create structured data tables for cross-language literature comparison.

tools.name: google_sheets_write_range
tools.description: Write extracted paper data to sheets (titles, authors, abstracts, findings by language).

tools.name: google_sheets_append_rows
tools.description: Append discovered papers to cumulative literature database.

tools.name: gmail_send_email
tools.description: Distribute multilingual literature reports to research teams.
